TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed DataSourceViewSelectCallback extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub DataSourceViewSelectCallback(data As IEnumerable)
type DataSourceViewSelectCallback = delegate of IEnumerable -> unit

param.name: data
param.span: 和 方法所傳回之資料錄的 集合。

span.span: An collection of data records that the and methods return.

summary.span: 表示資料繫結控制項提供給資料來源檢視的非同步回呼方法，以非同步擷取資料。

span.span: Represents the asynchronous callback method that a data-bound control supplies to a data source view for asynchronous data retrieval.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁和控制項的執行是同步的。By default, ASP.NET Web page and control execution is synchronous. 不過，ASP.NET 資料來源控制項也會支援使用非同步資料擷取模式，針對資料作業。However, ASP.NET data source controls also support an asynchronous data retrieval pattern for data operations. 沒有任何 ASP.NET 2.0 版所提供的資料來源控制項是非同步作業，但控制項開發人員可以建置為非同步作業的資料來源控制項。None of the data source controls provided by ASP.NET version 2.0 are asynchronous, but a control developer can build a data source control that is asynchronous. 物件支援以非同步擷取資料的方法。The object supports the method for asynchronous data retrieval. 委派傳遞至資料來源檢視由資料繫結控制項，以便檢視可以非同步處理序完成時呼叫這個委派，並將資料傳遞至資料繫結控制項。The delegate is passed to the data source view by a data-bound control, so that the view can call this delegate when asynchronous processing is complete and deliver the data to the data-bound control.
